sentences.en: As a result of many such painstaking studies, our present knowledge of the oceans has accumulated.
sentences.cn: 由于许多这类的艰苦研究, 我们现有的关于海洋方面的知识才得以积累起来.

sentences.en: Children receive painstaking care from their parents.
sentences.cn: 孩子们受到家长爱护备至的照料.

sentences.en: Chris described in painstaking detail what had happened.
sentences.cn: 克里斯非常详细地描述了所发生的事情。
哈里是个肯下苦功的学生.

sentences.en: He has finally cracked the system after years of painstaking research.
sentences.cn: 经过多年的努力研究，他终于找到了破解这个系统的办法。

sentences.en: He is painstaking with his work.
His painstaking to attain his goal in life is praiseworthy.
sentences.cn: 他为实现人生目标所下的苦功是值得称赞的.

sentences.en: In order to transform their environment, he drew up the project with painstaking accuracy.
sentences.cn: 为了改造环境， 他苦心孤诣地制订了这个计划。

sentences.en: In this masterpiece is embodied his life - time of painstaking work.
sentences.cn: 这部名著凝聚着他毕生的心血.

sentences.en: It had never been given such painstaking publicity.
sentences.cn: 这事从未象现在这样大张旗鼓地四处张扬过.

sentences.en: Painstaking craftsmanship using natural materials is key to Southwestern style.
sentences.cn: 对天然材料的精心制作工艺是西南部厨房风格的关键所在.

sentences.en: She is not very clever but she is painstaking.
sentences.cn: 她并不很聪明,但肯下苦功夫.

sentences.en: The enterprising students brought in carpet weavers, who reassembled the papers, strip by painstaking strip.
sentences.cn: 不肯善罢甘休的学生们找来了地毯编织工.这些工人把一条条碎纸拼到了一起.

sentences.en: The highest desire of his soul just now was for a respectable life of painstaking.
sentences.cn: 现在他内心里的最高愿望是过一种受人尊敬的、埋头苦干的生活.

sentences.en: The painstaking achievement that goes enjoying us one year!
sentences.cn: 去享受我们一年的辛苦成果!

sentences.en: The picture has been cleaned with painstaking care.
sentences.cn: 这幅画已被十分小心地擦干净了.

sentences.en: The work had been done with painstaking attention to detail.
sentences.cn: 这项工作被一丝不苟地完成了。

sentences.en: Through years of our painstaking efforts, we have at last achieved what we have today.
sentences.cn: 大家经过多少年的努力, 才取得今天的成绩.

sentences.en: You said in your address that "developing excellence is a slow, painstaking process".
sentences.cn: 你在你的致词中说“发展卓越性是一个缓慢艰苦的过程”。

trans.tran_cn: （不辞）劳苦的，辛苦的，煞费苦心的，苦干的，辛勤的，小心的，细心的，小心翼翼的
